::FZ::

FZ laughs at the bot's offer. He knew Maximal honor made them do wild 
things sometimes, but this..

"Foolish Maximal. Do you think I am Zardus? You're mistaken. I am 
what you might call his 'clone', a copy of himself made to help 
command. The real Zardus is at the Iron Fist fighting off a Trainer 
attack on the base."

He shakes his head. "Do you think Zardus rose to power by fighting 
one on one battles? No, he rose through cunning and intelligence, 
something you should consider upgrading in yourself. One on one duels 
prove nothing, they are a fancy made up to please the blood. Well, 
fight amongst your own team, as you seem to enjoy doing. Disagree 
with your leader and challenge her. Look around you, Maximal! My 
troops are ready to destroy your base and your team at my word. Even 
if you win a duel you will succeed at nothing but your own 
destruction. Your leader holds the only key to life for you, and that 
is a cease fire. I have bots in your base right now. Do you know how 
easy it would be for them to find the power source and destroy it? 
The explosion would whipe out the base beyond repair, regardless of 
who wins a few petty one on ones."

He smiles, going on with his little speach. "I know why you 
challenged me, Maximal. You believe that if you would defeat me, you 
would prove that your way is right, and you can rise up above Iron 
Raptor as leader. You would make an excellent Predacon. Cut right out 
for evil, perfectly. But as I have just said, your leader holds the 
only key to your survival. If you wish to throw away the lives of 
every single other Maximal here right now, which I believe is almost 
every Maximal on your planet, go ahead and attack. I do not garauntee 
a one on one, but I do garauntee that a cease-fire is the only way to 
live. Make a choice, Maximal. Stand down and your team will live, or 
fight and they will all die. There are still reinforcements that can 
come from the Alliance base at a moment's notice, and Maximal troops 
are in worse condition than Alliance. Make your choice. Obey your 
leader and let the Maximals live, or fight and condemn them to death."
